items.title: Stock Radar: ONGC, Reliance, PNB, AstraZeneca, GR Infra, BGR Energy, Arkade Developers, Coal India in focus on Tuesday
items.description: Pondy Oxides and Chemicals, Thangamayil Jewellery, Power Grid Corporation of India, Cubex Tubings, G R Infraprojects, Western Carriers India, and Northern Arc Capital will also be in focus on September 24.

items.title: Coal India stock in focus on forming JV with RRVUNL for thermal, renewable energy projects
items.description: State-owned Coal India has entered into a joint venture (JV) agreement with Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Utpadan Nigam Ltd (RRVUNL) to undertake renewable energy business in Rajasthan.

items.title: First Tick: Top 10 global cues for todayâ€™s trade

items.title: ONGC Videsh inks gas deal in Azerbaijan, Morgan Stanley sees 45% upside
items.description: ONGC Videsh, a wholly owned subsidiary of ONGC, is engaged in overseas E&P operations and is Indiaâ€™s largest international oil and gas E&P company.

items.title: Power Grid Corporation shares in focus on winning inter-state transmission project
items.description: Power Grid Corporation Share Price | The company has been declared the successful bidder under a tariff-based competitive bidding process to set up dynamic reactive compensation at Khavda Pooling Station 1 (KPS1) and Khavda Pooling Station 3 (KPS3) .

items.title: AstraZeneca Pharma shares in focus on CDSCO permission
items.description: AstraZeneca Pharma India Share Price Today | The company has received permission to import for sale and distribution of Durvalumab 120 mg/2.4 mL and 500 mg/10 mL solution for infusion (Imfinzi).

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a firm start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Global stock indexes rose on Monday as Federal Reserve policymakers said last week's large interest rate cut was warranted, while the euro fell against the dollar as business activity readings of the euro zone economy disappointed.

items.title: Stay selective on IT stocks amid soft management commentary, rich valuations: Jefferies
items.description: Jefferies sees limited scope for margin expansion in FY25 owing to slow revenue growth

items.title: MOFSL sees subscriber churn as key challenge for Vodafone Idea stock
items.description: Shares of Vodafone Idea were on fire in the last session as investors rejoiced the initiation of the company's mega capex plan.

items.title: GR Infraprojects stock jumps 4% on bagging Rs 903.5 crore contract from Maha Metro for Nagpur project
items.description: GR Infraprojects shares rose after the company secured a Rs 903.5-crore contract for the Nagpur Metro Rail Project, becoming the lowest bidder for a 17.624-km elevated metro viaduct.

items.title: Muthoot Finance â€“ Is the shine here to stay?
items.description: The increase in competitive intensity may emerge as a headwind once again

items.title: Agri Picks Report September 24, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, India received 2.7 mm of rainfall on Monday, 49% below the normal of 5.3 mm, the India Meteorological Department said. Since Jun 1, the country has received 880.8 mm of rainfall, 5% above the normal of 837.7 mm for the period, it said.

items.title: Osel Devices makes decent debut with 24% premium over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: Osel Devices IPO: Company specializes in manufacturing a wide range of LED display systems and hearing aids.

items.title: Reliance Power stock locked at 5% upper circuit on Rs 1,525 crore preferential issue
items.description: Reliance Power shares surged 5% after the company announced a preferential issue of equity shares worth Rs 1,524.60 crore, aimed at strengthening its financial position and expanding into renewable energy.

items.title: Spandana Sphoorty Financial shares rise 4% on sale of stressed loan portfolio for Rs 16.74 crore
items.description: The firm's board approved the sale of stressed loan portfolio, including written-off loans pool, with an outstanding value of Rs 304.41 crore for Rs 16.74 crore.

items.title: Western Carriers' muted debut: Stock lists marginally below IPO price, misses GMP
items.description: Western Carriers is one of India's leading private, multimodal, rail-focused, asset-light logistics companies, with a customer base of 1,647 across varied sectors.

items.title: GMR Power & Urban hit 5% upper circuit, at new record high on Emkay Global's 'buy' call
items.description: Emkay Global believes GMR Power is focused on reducing debt, thanks to strong cash flows, the conversion of FCCBs into equity, and the handover of the Hyderabad-Vijayawada road project

items.title: Northern Arc Capital shares list at 33% premium after bumper IPO bidding, but miss GMP
items.description: Northern Arc Capital IPO received massive investor interest after the issue was subscribed 110.71 times.

items.title: Arkade Developers debuts at 37% premium over IPO price; misses GMP estimate
items.description: Arkade Developers IPO, a fresh issue and an offer for sale, received a hefty response after the issue was subscribed a massive 106 times.

items.title: Popular Foundations share price hits lower circuit post listing, falls 5% from IPO price
items.description: Popular Foundations SME IPO wasn't well received by participants, getting just over 9 times subscriptions amid other SME IPOs getting 100 times or more subscriptions.

items.title: Metal stocks surge upto 5% as China announces fresh stimulus to bolster economy
items.description: The extended property crisis in the worldâ€™s second-largest economy negatively impacted metal demand, thus making the recent slew of measures to revive the sector a source of renewed optimism for metal stocks.

items.title: Deccan Transcon Leasing debuts at 7% premium over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: Deccan Transcon Leasing SME IPO was subscribed a massive 102 times over five days

items.title: Envirotech Systems lists at 89% premium over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: Envirotech Systems SME IPO: Company specializes in designing and supplying custom enclosures for noise reduction in machinery and mechanical equipment

items.title: Pelatro IPO: Shares list at 37.5% premium over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: Pelatro SME IPO was subscribed just 21.73 times with non-institutional investors buying 55 times

items.title: Indian utilities offer Rs 40 lakh crore investment opportunity, 'buy' Power Grid, Tata Power: Motilal Oswal
items.description: Analysts project a substantial investment opportunity of over Rs 40 lakh crore in the sector, driven by rising demand, modernisation of outdated infrastructure, and transition to cleaner energy sources

items.title: KFC, Pizza Hut operator Sapphire Foods' stock surges 12% to new high on large trade
items.description: Sapphire Foods shares jumped over 12 percent, reaching a record high, fueled by heavy trading volumes and a significant transaction involving 8.5 lakh shares at Rs 355 per share.

items.title: Hold Vodafone Idea; target of Rs 11: ICICI Securities
items.description: ICICI Securities recommended hold rating on Vodafone Idea with a target price of Rs 11 in its research report dated September 24, 2024.

items.title: Sealmatic India stock surges 6% after bagging power plant project from BHEL
items.description: Sealmatic is the only approved vendor for such super critical applications for the 660 MW power plants at BHEL, other than a few foreign vendors.

items.title: Buy Pitti Engineering; target of Rs 1552: KR Choksey
items.description: KR Choksey is bullish on Pitti Engineering has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1552 in its research report dated September 23, 2024.

items.title: Mankind Pharma extends winning streak to fourth day; hits record high
items.description: The technical indicators of Mankind Pharma also hint towards a bullish formation, reflecting the scope for further upside.

items.title: Neutral Bharat Forge; target of Rs 1470: Motilal Oswal
items.description: Motilal Oswal recommended Neutral rating on Bharat Forge with a target price of Rs 1470 in its research report dated September 23, 2024.

items.title: Buy ICICI Lombard; target of Rs 2650: Motilal Oswal
items.description: Motilal Oswal is bullish on ICICI Lombard recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 2650 in its research report dated September 23, 2024.

items.title: Buy Vedant Fashions; target of Rs 1600: ICICI Securities
items.description: ICICI Securities is bullish on Vedant Fashions recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1600 in its research report dated September 23, 2024.

items.title: Reduce Fusion Finance; target of Rs 260: Emkay Global Financial
items.description: Emkay Global Financial recommended reduce rating on Fusion Finance with a target price of Rs 260 in its research report dated September 23, 2024.

items.title: PNB stock slips 2.5% after QIP launched at discounted price
items.description: Punjab National Bank conducted roadshows for its QIP program, which reportedly generated strong demand from domestic mutual funds, signaling substantial investor interest.

items.title: Once held by Quant MF, this small cap stock is up 20% and here's why
items.description: In this small-cap stock, both Quant Mutual Fund and Mauritius-based AG Dynamics were once key players, having held stakes in the company back in 2022.

items.title: Now, rich individuals seek more quant-based strategies for their PMS investments
items.description: Industry participants attribute the increasing demand for quant strategies to a combination of factors, including better transparency and minimal influence of human emotional bias with respect to stock selection and churn.

items.description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on GMR Power and Urban Infra has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 180 in its research report dated September 24, 2024.

items.description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Aarti Industries has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 675 in its research report dated September 24, 2024.

items.title: Buy United Breweries; target of Rs 2350: Anand Rathi
items.description: Anand Rathi is bullish on United Breweries has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 2350 in its research report dated September 23, 2024.

items.title: Does spurt in abrupt resignations by statutory auditors point to governance issues?
items.description: Experts believe that this is a major governance issue and while the reasons for such sudden departure needs to be examined and analysed, auditors have mostly been very ambiguous in terms of giving the reasons for resigning

items.title: Nifty Hits 26,000 Milestone; Sensex Conquers 85,000 | Metals Shine On China Stimulus | Closing Bell
items.description:
Nifty, Sensex sail to new lifetime highs. Sensex scales to 85,000-mark for the first time. Nifty breaks 26,000 barrier in fag end of session. Nifty Metal top sectoral performer. Metal stocks shine on China's stimulus measures. Nifty Auto hits new all-time high. Catch Nandita Khemka and Lovisha Darad as they discuss stocks on their radar.
#stockmarket, #sharemarket #nifty #sensex #marketclosing

items.title: Taking Stock: Market fails to hold record high; Nifty crosses 26,000, Sensex above 85,000
items.description: Biggest Nifty gainers were Tata Steel, Hindalco Industries, Power Grid Corp, Tech Mahindra and Adani Enterprises, while losers included SBI Life Insurance, HUL, Grasim Industries, UltraTech Cement and Shriram Finance.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Stocks that moved the most on September 24
items.description: Indian equity indices ended on a flat note in the volatile session on September 24 after Nifty crossing 26,000 for the first time. Here are some of the stocks that moved the most in trade today.
